attributes.action: Stop price-gouging fans — end dynamic ticket pricing now.
attributes.additional_details:
I urge you to take action to ban dynamic pricing for live event tickets and make gigs affordable and accessible again.

Fans over profits: stop dynamic ticketing.
Fair tickets, not algorithms.
attributes.background:
Ban dynamic pricing, keep gigs accessible.
Fans shouldn’t be punished for wanting to see live music. Dynamic pricing drives ticket costs through the roof, turning gigs into luxury events instead of shared cultural experiences. It’s unfair, exploitative, and shuts people out of the music they love.

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign the following petition, which calls for similar action:

Ban dynamic ticket pricing for live events
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/728612
